name: Sink/Swim
description:
It feels like drowning...

Should I Sink / Swim?

Controls: 

W to move,

A &D to rotate

Instructions:

There are no time limits, take your time. Sink or swim around and collect glows (tip : wear headphones and use binaural audio as a guide to find the next ones).

Also the game loops.

---

I am not an artist, I used pictures of my face as reference.

I am not a writer, I found the lines from my old journal entry, they were not written specifically for the game.

I am a programmer though, but the controls may seem clunky and difficult, but it's on purpose  (tip: the movements are controlled by impulse force, a little goes a long way).

Because that is what depression feels like to me, like sinking, like swimming. There is a sense of helplessness that you can't control, but at the same time, you do. 

I am also a game designer, do you want to read my notes?
